thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 171 of 3757
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: Although there are several used book sellers in the area, one being huge, I found Thrift Books to be generally accurate in the description of each offering. Being able to purchase from this seller online is convenient and the prices very reasonable. A big plus is the number of catagories one can search through to find that one volume that will make it into their library.
